title: Doubleclicking on import statement transfers to referenced type
description: In the package view outline, when doubleclicking on a type import statement, the editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference, but it instead opens on the target type.
OB: When doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor should open on the unit hosting the import reference.
EB: When doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline, the editor opens on the target type instead of the unit hosting the import reference.
SR: Ensure that doubleclicking on a type import statement in the package view outline opens the editor on the unit hosting the import reference rather than the target type.
